mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO SYS_USER( N_XH, N_BXH, C_DM, C_MC, N_XSXH, C_TJ, C_SJDM, D_DJ )VALUES( SEQ_DM.NEXTVAL,
#{nBxh}, #{cDm}, #{cMc}, #{nXsxh}, #{cTj}, #{cSjdm}, to_date(#{dDj},'YYYY-MM-DD') )
SELECT SEQ_DM.CURRVAL AS ID FROM dual
mapper.update: update D_DM set N_BXH = #{nBxh}, C_DM = #{cDm}, C_MC = #{cMc}, N_XSXH = #{nXsxh}, C_TJ = #{D_DJ}, C_SJDM = #{cSjdm}, D_DJ = to_date(#{dDj},'YYYY-MM-DD') WHERE N_XH = #{nXh}
